suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SES mail driver (^3.322.9).
suggest.illuminate/http: Required to create an attachment from an UploadedFile instance (^13.0).
suggest.resend/resend-php: Required to enable support for the Resend mail transport (^0.10.0 || ^1.0).
suggest.symfony/http-client: Required to use the Symfony API mail transports (^7.4 || ^8.0).
suggest.symfony/mailgun-mailer: Required to enable support for the Mailgun mail transport (^7.4 || ^8.0).
suggest.symfony/postmark-mailer: Required to enable support for the Postmark mail transport (^7.4 || ^8.0).
